terminate file with CR/LF in case it isn't ....
the concatenated result file is UTF-8 without BOM. Finally we do set the UTF-8 BOM now

ExpSyntax.val: Right (Upper (Trim ({0,14})),4)='.PDF' OR Right (Upper (Trim ({0,14})),4)='.ZIP' OR Right (Upper (Trim ({0,14})),4)='.RAR' OR Right (Upper (Trim ({0,14})),4)='.XPS'

Text.val: get the last two characters from file (blob) ...
Neither Windows nor Unix line termination. We'll add CR/LF to last line ...
